articles.author: Kelly Kasulis Cho
articles.title: Plane carrying Malawi vice president goes missing; search underway - The Washington Post
articles.description: A plane carrying Vice President Saulos Chilima and nine others went missing in bad weather, putting the East African country’s Defense Force on alert.
articles.content:
A search is underway in Malawi after a plane carrying the countrys vice president and nine others went missing Monday morning amid tumultuous weather.
Soldiers have begun combing through a mountaino… [+2795 chars]
